name: Phonetic-Color
description: Phoneme mapper that colors phonemes based on their proximity to one another.
author: Isaac Madwed

scripts.build: cp *.js *.html *.json ../build/ && cp -r ./cmudict/ ../build/cmudict/ && cp -r ./public/stylesheets/ ../build/public/stylesheets/ && cp -r ./public/lib/ ../build/public/lib/ && cp -r ./public/fonts/ ../build/public/fonts/ && browserify ./public/js/runner.js -o ../build/public/js/build.js && uglifyjs ../build/public/js/build.js --compress --mangle -o ../build/public/js/build.js && uglifyjs ../build/router.js --compress --mangle -o ../build/router.js && uglifyjs ../build/app.js --compress --mangle -o ../build/app.js && uglifyjs ../build/wordColorer.js --compress --mangle -o ../build/wordColorer.js
